name: fst-reader
description: A Node.js library for reading FST waveform files, designed to parse and access signal values from Fast Signal Trace (FST) files generated in digital simulation tools.
author: Shou-Li Hsu

scripts.build-fst-lib: mkdir -p external/libfst/build && cd external/libfst/build && cmake .. && make
scripts.build: npm run build-fst-lib && npm run build-addon
